org.gcn.plinguacore.simulator

Class AlternativeStepsSupportedSimulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gcn.plinguacore.simulator.DecoratorSimulator
      • org.gcn.plinguacore.simulator.AlternativeStepsSupportedSimulator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, ISimulator

    public abstract class AlternativeStepsSupportedSimulator
extends DecoratorSimulator
    This class provides support for selecting and executing alternative rules different from the selected one by default
    Author:
    Research Group on Natural Computing (http://www.gcn.us.es)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AlternativeStepsSupportedSimulator(ISimulator decorated)
      Creates a new AlternativeStepsSupportedSimulator which will use sim as decorated field, as stated in Singleton pattern

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract boolean alternateStep()
      Executes an alternate step and returns if the step has been properly executed
      abstract int countAlternatives()
      If possible, counts the number of alternative steps available for the simulator
      boolean supportsAlternateSteps()
      In AlternativeStepsSupportedSimulator instances, this method always returns true

      • alternateStep

        public abstract boolean alternateStep()
        Executes an alternate step and returns if the step has been properly executed
        Specified by:
        alternateStep in interface ISimulator
        Overrides:
        alternateStep in class DecoratorSimulator
        Returns:
        false if there is not alternate configurations. True if a new configuration was generated.
        See Also:

      • countAlternatives

        public abstract int countAlternatives()
                               throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        If possible, counts the number of alternative steps available for the simulator
        Specified by:
        countAlternatives in interface ISimulator
        Overrides:
        countAlternatives in class DecoratorSimulator
        Returns:
        The number of possible next configurations in the next level of the non-deterministic tree
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if alternate steps are not supported
        See Also:
        ISimulator.countAlternatives()
